Detailed Description

The locking strategy for our Packets.

The ACE_Data_Block allows us to choose a locking strategy for making the reference counting thread-safe. The ACE_Lock_Adaptor<> template adapts the interface of a number of lock objects so that the ACE_Message_Block will have an interface it can use.

Member Function Documentation

int Packet::Lock::destroy ( void )
 

Called when the lock is no longer needed.

destroy() will be called to explicitly delete the lock when we no longer need it. The method will then cleanup to prevent any memory leaks.
